flowRoot.flowPara: Passive houses; retrofit to avoid heating/cooling; "wear a jumper"
On-site renewables; low-carbon building materials
Energy efficient appliances; condensing boilers
Reduce calories to daily needs; avoid food waste
Low-meat diets
Re-use food waste; efficient fridges; fresh food vs processed
Compact cities & land-use planning to reduce travel; teleworking
Mode shift from car to cycling, walking, or public transport
Electric vehicles; lightweight vehicles; Eco-driving functions
Reduce consumption; sharing & long-life products; circular economy
Shift to recycled & low-carbon materials in products and infrastructure
Enhance process efficiency
N/A (via sectoral demand)
Shift to lower and zero-carbon fuel sources (coal to gas, gas to renewables)
Improve conversion efficiency; utilise by-products (heat)
demand via sufficiency, consumption reductions
Improve
the efficiency of energy conversion and use
Shift
towards lowest carbon consumption mode
Avoid demand through family planning, public health & education
Shift to lower carbon fuel sources; improve extraction efficiency
Improve conversion efficiency; shift to alternative devices
Improve the preservation and recovery of useful energy; shift to collective passive systems, or alternative energy chains
Organise infrastructure and services to minimise upstream energy demand (e.g. compact urban form; localised or online service access)
Prioritise basic needs and universal service access; promote sufficiency (contra unconstrained luxury consumption)
